extensionDescription.message: The official browser extension for Passwords for Nextcloud

browserActionTitle.description: Title of the button in the browser bar

contextMenuTitle.description: Title of the context menu item

protocolHandler.description: Title of the custom protocol handler

MigrationAccountName.description: Label assigned to the account used by the v1.x migration

ValidationMinLength.message: The $FIELD$ must be at least $MIN$ characters long

ValidationMaxLength.message: The $FIELD$ must be shorter than $MAX$ characters

ValidationNotAnUrl.message: The base url must be a valid url

ValidationNotAToken.message: The token must be a valid Nextcloud token

ValidationDuplicate.message: There is already an account for this user on this Nextcloud.

NoRelatedPasswords.message: Did not find any related passwords

NoSearchResults.message: Did not find any passwords for your search

NoRelatedMatches.description: Shown when the related page did not find any results

NoSearchMatches.description: Shown when the search did not find any results

NoSearchQuery.description: Shown when the search query is empty

PasswordRequestFailedTitle.description: Notification title when the password request fails

PasswordRequestFailedText.message:
The password list could not be retrieved.
Error: $ERROR$
PasswordRequestFailedText.description: Notification text when the password request fails

PasswordEncodingFailedTitle.description: Notification title when the password properties can not be parsed

PasswordEncodingFailedText.message: The properties of password #$ID$ do not contain valid JSON data and could not be processed
PasswordEncodingFailedText.description: Notification text when the password properties can not be parsed

NewLoginDetectedTitle.description: Notification title when a new login is detected

NewLoginDetectedText.message: Click here to save the password for "$USER$"
NewLoginDetectedText.description: Notification text when a new login is detected

PasswordCreatedTitle.description: Notification title when a password was saved

PasswordCreatedText.description: Notification text when a password was saved

CreatePasswordFailedTitle.description: Notification title when saving a password failed

CreatePasswordFailedText.message: The password could not be saved
CreatePasswordFailedText.description: Notification text when saving a password failed

UpdatedLoginDetectedTitle.description: Notification title when an updated login is detected

UpdatedLoginDetectedText.message: Click here to update the password for "$USER$"
UpdatedLoginDetectedText.description: Notification text when an updated login is detected

PasswordUpdatedTitle.description: Notification title when a password was updated

PasswordUpdatedText.description: Notification text when a password was updated

UpdatePasswordFailedTitle.description: Notification title when updating a password failed

UpdatePasswordFailedText.message: The password could not be updated
UpdatePasswordFailedText.description: Notification text when updating a password failed

ApiLogin200.description: Error text when an api request could not be decoded

ApiLogin401.description: Error text when an api request got a 401 Unauthorized response

ApiLogin403.description: Error text when an api request got a 403 Forbidden response

ApiLogin404.description: Error text when an api request got a 404 Not Found response

ApiLogin500.description: Error text when an api request got a 50x Internal Server Error response

ApiLoginGeneric.description: Generic error message for failed requests

SettingsInvalidUrl.message:
The url $URL$ seems to be invalid.

 If the url of the app is
https://example.com/index.php/apps/passwords
you need to enter
https://example.com

If the url of the app is
https://example.com/nextcloud/index.php/apps/passwords
you need to enter
https://example.com/nextcloud
SettingsInvalidUrl.description: Generic error message for failed requests

DarkMode.description: Lable of the Dark Mode setting
